input.sentences: we settled roadside for the start of the parade .
the police started the parade off as they rode in on motorcycles .
they were followed by the military | as they carried flags in .
there were some neat costumes in this parade .
the marching band also showed off their talents .
output.sentences: To make the parade possible they had to re-do the pavement.
They had to make sure none of the motorcycles hit bumps.
The people walking in the parade were very grateful for the pavement improvement.
They could all dance and hop around without tripping
The flaggers could concentrate on flagging not their step.
